name: Fusion Auto Finance
title: Fullstack Software Engineer
description: An Auto Financing Company. I was on a small development team working with Django applications

name: Triple Play Pay
title: Fullstack Software Developer
description: A payments proessing platform, akin to Stripe. I was able to contribute to software for a wide array of technologies and applications in the payments industry. From squashing user-facing bugs in Vue, to developing API endpoints for card present devices in Python, to creating mobile (iOS/Android) application libraries for use in React-Native. I gained a lot of insight about software integration from the perspective of an integrator, and an API designer.

name: GearMinds STEM Academy
title: STEM Instructor
description: An after school program focused on preparing kids of all ages for a job in tech. At GearMinds I tought everything from basic programming priciples using drag-and-drop languages, to showing how simple circuits worked with breadboards and MicroPython, to teaching advanced programming concepts and simple website construction with Python and JavaScript.

name: Exela Technologies
title: Embedded Developer
description: A company specializing in automation. I was tasked with writing firmware for an in-house project using ESP32 microcontrollers. We leveraged the ESP-IDF as well as MicroPython to prototype the device. The device interfaced with an ultrasonic sensor (HC-SR04) and air quality (MQ135) sensor in order to operate with its intended purpose.

name: ThoughtSwift Medical Technologies
title: Software Developer
description: A service provider for medical practices. I designed and maintained a multitude of php forms that replaced pen and paper at the doctors office. I also implemented the logic needed to provide the forms to the intended recepients, and used JS/CSS to design the forms and make them accessible.
